      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Item ItemInfo.generateItem()
      Generates an item using the information of this object.
      Item ItemManager.getItem(int monsterLevel, org.newdawn.slick.geom.Vector2f v)
      Returns an item based on the level of the monster kills and places it at the vector the monster was killed at.
      Item ItemManager.getSpecificItem(Quality q, java.lang.String name)
      Returns a specific item by quality and name.
